summary: This mod contains .psd files each with a single layer of various pubic hair styles for CBBE v3.0 2048x2048 textures.  The file is designed to be used with Caliente\'s Texture Blender.
descriptionHtml:
*****************************************************************

	                TES: Skyrim
	          LFox CBBE Pubic Hair v1.01
			 Made by LFox

*****************************************************************

     1. Mod Description and Installing

*****************************************************************

This mod contains .psd files which each contain a single layer
of pubic hair for CBBE v3.0 made for the default 2048x2048
texture size.  If you want to use it for other body mods you
will need to reposition the hair layer and possibly resized it
slightly to fit.

The file itself is designed to work with Caliente\'s Texture
Blender found at the link below.  I made it this way so people
can blend it with the default texture or add it to one they\'ve
customized.  Since it\'s a layer you can also customize the
color if you tweak it in Photoshop or some other program that
reads .psd files.

Caliente\'s Texture Blender
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5737

Pubic Hair Styles
*****************
There are currently two types of pubic hair styles available.
For how they look please refer to the screenshots.

Bush - Modest size patch of overgrown pubic hair.
Forest - Large size patch of overgrown pubic hair.

For Default Install
*******************
To install it extract the files to Caliente\'s Texture Blender
under \\Library\\Body and Feet\\Color\\PubicHair\\

Next open TexBlend select Body and Feet as the Set and Color
as the Type.  Make sure the Use Currently Installed Textures
box is ticked.  Then select the file of the hair you\'d like
from the list.  All hair styles from this package start with
the prefix LFox.

Hit the preview button to give you an idea what it\'ll turn out
like and hit blend when your finished.

*****************************************************************

     2. Version History

*****************************************************************

v1.01
- Added new Bush Style Pubic Hair.

v1.0
- Made the plugin
author: LFox
